welcomePage.title: Welcome to NoCab Desktop!
welcomePage.description:
Nocab Desktop is a file transfer application that allows you to transfer files between your devices without any server or third party service.
It is completely free and open source.

noCabMobilePage.title: Meet NoCab Mobile!
noCabMobilePage.description:
NoCab Mobile is required to connect with your phone
Unfortunetaly there is no ios application üòî
noCabMobilePage.description2: Download the mobile application for android!

instructions.step2: 2- Download the latest version of mobile application
instructions.step3: 3- Install the application on your phone

networkAdapterPage.title: Your Network
networkAdapterPage.description:
NoCab uses your local ip to connect another devices.
If network adapter setted wrong the application will not work.
networkAdapterPage.description2: Make sure that your network adapter is setted correctly.
networkAdapterPage.hint: You will be able to change from home screen

useInstructions.title: So how to use NoCab?
useInstructions.hint: That's it! You can now send files between your devices.

instructions.step1: Make sure your both devices are connected to the same network
instructions.step2: Open the NoCab on both devices
instructions.step3: Click on the send button on the device you want to send the file from
instructions.step4: Click on the receive button on the device you want to receive the file from (no need for desktop application)

references.contactText: If you have any questions, feel free to contact me.

transfers.title: Transfers
transfers.emptyMessage: There is nothing except a sea of emptiness

transferStarted.message:
Transfer started
Waiting for device to connect

emptyState.title: No Entry Found
emptyState.message: You have to make at least one transfer to see it here

warnMessages.notFound: File moved or deleted. Maybe not even existed in the universe

emptyState.title: No, There is nothing!
emptyState.message: Click any history item to see more details

deviceName.title: Device Name
deviceName.description: The name of this device as shown to other devices

themeColor.title: Theme Color
themeColor.description: Change the color of the application

useSystemColor.title: Use System Color
useSystemColor.description: Use the system color as the theme color

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Change the theme of the application

hideSponsorSnackbar.title: Hide Sponsor Snackbar
hideSponsorSnackbar.description: Hide the sponsor snackbar that sometimes appears when the transfer is completed

materialYou.title: Use Material 3 Design
materialYou.description: Use Material 3 (Material You) as the theme

dateFormat.title: Date & Time Format
dateFormat.description: Change the date and time format

language.title: Language
language.description: Change the language of the application

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: These options are for advanced users only. Changing these options may cause the application to malfunction.

finderPort.title: Finder Port
finderPort.description:
The port will be used to communicate with the device you want to connect to.
Changing this option may cause the application to malfunction.
Default: 62193
finderPort.help: This will take effect after restarting the application.

deleteHistory.title: Delete All History
deleteHistory.description: Delete all history. This action cannot be undone.

dialog.title: Delete History
dialog.message: You are about to delete all history. This action cannot be undone.

forceRegenerateSettings.title: Force Regenerate Settings
forceRegenerateSettings.description: Force regenerate settings. This action cannot be undone.

dialog.title: Regenerate Settings
dialog.message: This will delete all your settings and regenerate them. Are you sure you want to continue?

deviceScanner.instructions: Open the NoCab app on your phone and click receive.
deviceScanner.networkHint: Make sure both devices are on the same network.

senderQr.title: Scan QR Code
senderQr.instructions: Click "Receive" button and scan the QR code from the NoCab Mobile app

loading.title: Creating server...
loading.message: Please wait while the QR code is being loaded

title.one: {deviceName} wants to send you a file

aboutDialog.errorMessage:
Cant fetch contributors.
You may exceed the rate limit of github or you not have internet connection.

checking.title: Checking for updates...
checking.message: Please wait while the update is being checked

updateAvailable.title: New version available
updateAvailable.switchToMsixMessage: You are using the portable version of NoCab. Portable version cant be updated automatically. Please switch to the MSIX version.

cleanTemp.title: Cleaning Temporary Files
cleanTemp.description: Cleaning temporary files generated during the update process

waitProcesses.title: Waiting Ongoing Processes
waitProcesses.description: Waiting for ongoing processes to continue the update process

moveData.title: Moving Settings & History
moveData.description: Moving settings and history to the msix package

moveData.error: Failed to move settings and history

cleanPortable.title: Cleaning Portable Files
cleanPortable.description: Cleaning portable files to prevent conflicts
cleanPortable.success: Portable files will be cleaned after app closed

finish.title: Finishing Update
